page.title: 10LIFE STYLES Popular Music
page.content: {0_13 years Children hear and see pop music almost from birth.Radio programmes,TV videos of groups like Black Lace,Roland Rat, Nursery Rhymes appeal to young children.Older children like Wham,Nik Kershaw and Duran Duran. {13_30 years This age group are very strongly influenced by fashionable music and video,listen to radio,watch TV and rent and buy videos,recordings of groups and films following modern trends. {30_60 years} The music they like is varied pop artists like Elton John,The Beatles, Stevie Wonder,Barry Manilow,seem to appeal.This group still relate strangly to music of the 60's. {60+ years This age group likes more classical
